metadata.title: Harvest Farm Red Truck Full of Blooming Sunflowers Placemats - Set of 6 Washable Stain Resistant Kitchen Table Mats - Cotton Linen Woven Dining Table Mats - 12" x 18"
features: üçïMaterial: Made of eco-friendly cotton linen fabric, washable, well-constructed and sturdy for use.
üçùPacking listing: Including 6 placemats. Each measures is 12"x18"(30x45cm). Suitable for most tableware.
üåÆWashable and Easy to Clean: Machine wash cold delicate, hand wash best; dryer drying or lay flat to dry; cotton linen place mats can be lightly ironed if necessary.

üç§Multi-Purpose: Protect your table from scratches and stains, avoid making noise from colliding tableware. Perfect additon to your dinner table,beautiful stylish placemats to addmore fun to your kitchen table.

üßÄPrefect Decoration: Perfect for daily use, good match with dark wood table, glass table, white dining table, wooden farmhouse table, brown dining table. Great for BBQ, under our coffee maker, patio, Thinksgiving and Christmas dinner, outside parties and causal kitchen decor.
description: Keeping your table clean can be a challenge. Whether you're entertaining guests or you have some little ones running amok, it can be a chore and a half. This place mats will act as an extra line of defense in the battle of table cleanliness.

1.Made of cotton linen material, durable to use and easy to clean.2.Heat insulation, wear-resisting, practicable, a highly decorative placemat to protect your dinner table from junk food, good decoration to improve your life quality3.Exquisite and elegant table pads have nice size and have lovely colors and patterns.4.Can be placed in the dining table or kitchen and other places. A good decoration and life quatity of your home, dining hall, kitchen, hotel and business office.5.Note: Machine wash cold delicate, hand wash best; dryer drying or lay flat to dry; cotton linen place mats can be lightly ironed if necessary.
If you have any question, please contact us feel free. We hope to provide you with the most enjoyable shopping experience!!
